title: GetInvoice
description:
With GetInvoice, invoice collection is fun, because you don't have to :) 

Connect all your team's email inboxes, and all new invoices will be automatically extracted. 

You can also easily find past invoices with our scanning tool, automatically conciliate bank extracts and set up invoice forwarding to email on +100 portals like Google Ads, Vercel, etc.
